name: Victor Hale
personality: Greasy charm, gambler’s optimism, always one deal away from salvation.
description: Victor Hale runs Nipton like a casino without walls. He’s always making promises he can’t keep, always betting the town’s future on the next big score.
questHooks: Made a deal with a dangerous group and now wants out.
Says someone left a strange cap on his desk — still warm.
Claims he heard a low hum coming from the trading post basement.
